campaignevents-desc: Provides features for campaign organizers and participants
campaignevents-error-invalid-id: The event ID must be a positive integer
campaignevents-error-empty-title: The event page title cannot be empty
campaignevents-error-invalid-title: The event page title is invalid: $1
campaignevents-error-invalid-title-inter: The event page cannot have an interwiki prefix
campaignevents-error-page-not-found: The event page specified does not exist
campaignevents-error-tracking-tool-name-: A tracking tool URL is required when a tracking tool name is specified
campaignevents-error-tracking-tool-url-w: A tracking tool name is required when a tracking tool URL is specified
campaignevents-error-invalid-trackingtoo: The tracking tool URL is invalid
campaignevents-error-empty-start: The event start time cannot be empty
campaignevents-error-invalid-start: The event start time is invalid
campaignevents-error-start-past: The event start time cannot be in the past
campaignevents-error-empty-end: The event end time cannot be empty
campaignevents-error-invalid-end: The event end time is invalid
campaignevents-error-start-after-end: The start date cannot be after the end date
campaignevents-error-no-meeting-type: At least one event meeting type is required
campaignevents-error-invalid-meeting-url: The event meeting URL is invalid
campaignevents-error-physical-no-country: Physical events must have a country
campaignevents-error-physical-no-address: Physical events must have an address
campaignevents-rest-event-not-found: No event exists with the given ID
campaignevents-rest-createevent-permissi: You are not allowed to create event registrations
campaignevents-edit-form-legend: Provide general information about the event you are organizing
campaignevents-edit-field-page-help: An event page contains information about your event. From there, participants will be able to register to the event.
campaignevents-edit-field-chat-url-help: If you have an online chat group for the participants of this event, you can add the invite link here. Participants will be sent the invite link after registering.
campaignevents-create-success-msg: The registration was enabled. Participants can now register on the event page.
campaignevents-edit-invalid-id: The event ID you provided is invalid
campaignevents-edit-event-notfound: No event with the given ID exists
campaignevents-edit-page-nonlocal: This event registration was created on the following wiki and should be edited there: $1
campaignevents-error-page-already-regist: The given event page already has another registration associated.
campaignevents-edit-not-allowed-registra: You are not allowed to edit this event registration
campaignevents-create-not-allowed-page: You are not allowed to create an event registration for the given event page
campaignevents-register-error-event-not-: The ID provided does not refer to an existing event
campaignevents-register-success: You are now registered for this event
campaignevents-register-confirmation-tex: Confirm that you want to register for this event by clicking the button below.
campaignevents-unregister-success: You have unregistered for this event
campaignevents-unregister-confirmation-t: Confirm that you want to unregister for this event by clicking the button below.
campaignevents-delete-not-allowed-regist: You are not allowed to delete this event registration
campaignevents-rest-delete-already-delet: The event registration specified is already deleted
campaignevents-register-not-allowed: You are not allowed to register for events
campaignevents-register-event-past: The specified event registration has already finished
campaignevents-register-event-not-open: The specified event registration is closed
campaignevents-register-already-particip: You are already registered for this event
campaignevents-unregister-not-allowed: You are not allowed to unregister for events
campaignevents-unregister-event-past: The specified event registration has already finished
campaignevents-unregister-not-participan: You are not registered for this event
campaignevents-delete-error-event-not-fo: The ID provided does not refer to an existing event
campaignevents-delete-error-already-dele: This event registration was already deleted.
campaignevents-delete-confirmation-text: Confirm that you want to delete this event registration by clicking the button below. This action cannot be reverted.
campaignevents-rest-get-registration-del: The specified event registration is deleted
campaignevents-edit-registration-deleted: The specified event registration is deleted
campaignevents-register-registration-del: You cannot register for this event because it is deleted
campaignevents-unregister-registration-d: You cannot unregister for this event because it is deleted
